## Coding Practice

```{r}
#create and store two new vectors
vec_a <- c(1,6)
vec_a
class(vec_a)
vec_b <- c(2,4)
class(vec_b)
```

```{r}
#Check answers 
vec_a + vec_b # (3,10)
vec_b - vec_a # (1,-2)
2*vec_a #(2,12)
vec_a %*% vec_b #26
```
